txt.en: 'Thank you! Without my bow, I could not have hunted them myself. I appreciate your help.'
You should bring the deer meat to Hal Wolfscomb.\n\nHal is in a small encampment in northern Tharbad.

Hal Wolfscomb has asked you to hunt Ruddymore does and bucks and to bring back their meat to help feed his companions.\n\nRuddymore does and bucks are roaming the fields north-west of Tharbad, in Cardolan.
With their supplies stolen by the Orcs of Tharbad, the folks who came down from Bree are facing the coming days with nothing to eat.

'Have you been across the road to see the herds of deer? What a sight they are! Magnificent creatures, and good eating too! We surely could use the supplement to our rations, as the Orcs no doubt ate all of our food. If youâ€™ve a mind to help, bringing us some of the deer meat would go a long way.'
